<a id="AnimationNodeBlendTree"></a>

# AnimationNodeBlendTree

**Inherits:** [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md) **\<** [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A sub-tree of many type [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md)\\ s used for complex animations. Used by [AnimationTree](AnimationTree.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This animation node may contain a sub-tree of any other type animation nodes, such as [AnimationNodeTransition](AnimationNodeTransition.md), [AnimationNodeBlend2](AnimationNodeBlend2.md), [AnimationNodeBlend3](AnimationNodeBlend3.md), [AnimationNodeOneShot](AnimationNodeOneShot.md), etc. This is one of the most commonly used animation node roots.

An [AnimationNodeOutput](AnimationNodeOutput.md) node named ``output`` is created by default.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using AnimationTree](../tutorials/animation/animation_tree.md)

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_OK"></a>

<!-- classref-constant -->

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_INPUT"></a>

<!-- classref-constant -->

**CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_INPUT** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_INPUT)

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_INPUT_INDEX"></a>

<!-- classref-constant -->

**CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_INPUT_INDEX** = `2` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_INPUT_INDEX)

The specified input port is out of range.

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_OUTPUT"></a>

<!-- classref-constant -->

**CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_OUTPUT** = `3` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_NO_OUTPUT)

The output node is ``null``.

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_SAME_NODE"></a>

<!-- classref-constant -->

**CONNECTION_ERROR_SAME_NODE** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_SAME_NODE)

Input and output nodes are the same.

<!-- classref-constant -->

**CONNECTION_ERROR_CONNECTION_EXISTS** = `5` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendTree_constant_CONNECTION_ERROR_CONNECTION_EXISTS)

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendTree_method_add_node"></a>

Adds an [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) at the given `position`. The `name` is used to identify the created sub animation node later.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendTree_method_connect_node"></a>

Connects the output of an [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) as input for another [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md), at the input port specified by `input_index`.
